price: 69.Kitab marak (Yahuud kee Nasaara kinnuk) horta islaam gitak sin makkossam faxxa muslimiiney, usun wohut sinni Nafsik-sa makkoysaanam malón, usun woh mayaaxigaana immay.
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنتُمۡ تَشۡهَدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-antum tashhadūna
